item.description:
Many people had to miss this walk becuase it was supposed to rain.

We will meet in Newton Center where there is a big parking lot with free parking after 6. We will walk down center st to needham st and then up Christina St to Dedham St and then back to Newton Center using Parker St. (all one big loop) This walk took an hour and a half last time but I can think of ways to make it longer extending it into two hours.
item.name: The beatifull Garden City of Newton Walk
